document.full_text: japanese auto sales fell by a third in may, the lowest total for the month since 1968, as car makers struggled to restart production after the earthquake and tsunami that roiled the country in march.
document.title: japan may auto sales worst since 1968; hyundai rises
lines_and_colors: japanese auto sales fell by a third in may, the lowest total for the month since 1968, as car makers struggled to restart production after the earthquake and tsunami that roiled the country in march.
